text: A Midsummer Night's Sex Comedy is a 1982 American comedy movie directed by Woody Allen (who also stars) and based on the 1955 Ingmar Bergman's Smiles of a Summer Night. It stars Mia Farrow, Jos√© Ferrer, Julie Hagerty, Tony Roberts, Mary Steenburgen, Michael Higgins and distributed by Warner Bros. The movie was nominated for one Razzie in 1983. ==Other websites== * Category:1982 comedy movies Category:1980s sex comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Woody Allen Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: A Midsummer Night's Sex Comedy
